heading: Meet JoJo
paragraph: Joseph (JoJo) Burgess is the son of two former steelworkers and Alumni of Washington’s Trinity High School. Upon graduating, JoJo went on to serve 7 years in the U.S. Army including a tour in Operation Desert Storm in Iraq. After his service, he began a career in manufacturing and started his 20-year membership with the United Steelworkers Union. He is currently a New Employee Organization Trainer in the U.S. Steel Clairton Coke Works facility. JoJo was the 2nd Vice-Chair of the Washington County Democratic Committee and now serves as the congressional coordinator for the 14th Congressional District for the union’s rapid resource program.
